original_text: Then God said, “Put your hand back inside your cloak.” So he put his hand back inside his cloak, and when he took it out, behold, it was restored like the rest of his flesh.
korean_text: 이르시되 네 손을 다시 품에 넣으라 하시매 그가 다시 손을 품에 넣었다가 내어보니 그의 손이 본래의 살로 되돌아왔더라

sentences.original_text: Put your hand back inside your cloak.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 손을 네 겉옷 속으로 다시 넣으라.

sentences.original_text: So he put his hand back inside his cloak,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그가 손을 겉옷 속으로 다시 넣으니,

sentences.original_text: and when he took it out,
it was restored like the rest of his flesh.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그의 다른 살과 같이 회복되었더라.
